member.name: T:Ektron.ContentDesigner.ContentDesigner
member.summary: This class does the interfacing into the Telerik editor. A derived server control class is required.

member.name: M:Ektron.ContentDesigner.ContentDesigner.Render(System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter)
member.summary: The render method is used for rendering the Telerik editor. RenderContents is the default placed in by the wizard, but it is not called if derived from the Telerik editor.

member.name: P:Ektron.ContentDesigner.ContentDesigner.DesignTime
member.summary: Determins if the control is being rendered in VisualStudio.NET

member.name: P:Ektron.ContentDesigner.ContentDesigner.CanModifyImg
member.summary: Boolean Flag to indicate if current user can add images to the Ektron CMS Library

member.name: P:Ektron.ContentDesigner.ContentDesigner.LibraryAllowed
member.summary: Boolean Flag to indicate if current user can access Ektron CMS Library

member.name: P:Ektron.ContentDesigner.ContentDesigner.ToolsFile
member.summary: String File Path to the configuration ToolsFile used in the editor

member.name: P:Ektron.ContentDesigner.ContentDesigner.FolderId
member.summary: Identification Number for the folder of the current content in the editor

member.name: P:Ektron.ContentDesigner.ContentDesigner.SchemaFiles
member.remarks: For examples, "http://www.w3.org/2002/08/xhtml/xhtml1-transitional.xsd" for XHTML 1.0 Transitional, "http://www.w3.org/2002/08/xhtml/xhtml1-strict.xsd" for XHTML 1.0 Strict and "http://www.w3.org/TR/2006/PR-xhtml-modularization-20060213/SCHEMA/xhtml11.xsd" for XHTML 1.1

member.name: P:Ektron.ContentDesigner.ContentDesigner.SchemaNamespaces
member.summary: Namespaces used for the Schema Validation

member.name: P:Ektron.ContentDesigner.ContentDesigner.Content
member.summary: Gets or sets the content including the tags.
member.value: The text content including the tags. The default is string.Empty.

remarks.para: The text returned by this property contains tags. If only the text is needed use the Text property.
The property is the same as the deprecated Html property.
